text: Allan Eric Funk (born July 7, 1971) is an American professional wrestler. He currently competes in Lucha Libre USA where he competes under the ring name Chi Chi. He is best known for his time in World Championship Wrestling (WCW) where he competed under the ring name Kwee Wee and Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA) under the name Bruce where he was one-half of The Rainbow Express, a stereotypical homosexual tag team with Lenny Lane. ==Championships== *Big Time Wrestling **BTW Ohio Tag Team Championship (one time) *Total Nonstop Action Wrestling **Miss TNA (one time) ==References== ==Other websites== *Archive of Kwee Wee's WCW profile *Online World of Wrestling profile Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: Allan Funk
